formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Lighting VA (raw): L_raw = A × U Lighting VA (demanded): L = L_raw × (D_L / 100) × C_L Receptacles VA (count mode): R_raw = N × 180 Receptacles VA (known): R_raw = R_known Receptacles VA (demand per Table 220.44): R = 10,000 + 0.5 × max(0, R_raw − 10,000) Receptacles VA (custom %): R = R_raw × (D_R / 100) HVAC VA (noncoincident): H = max(H_cool, H_heat) Motors VA: M = (Σ m_i) + 0.25 × max(m_i) Total kVA: kVA_total = (L + R + S + W + H + M) / 1000 Current (single-phase): I = VA_total / V_L-L Current (3-phase): I = VA_total / (√3 × V_L-L)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
